actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for cost-of-living adjustments in the amount of the personal exemptions and in the zero bracket amount which is the equivalent of the standard deduction of prior law.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide cost-of-living adjustments to personal exemptions and standard deductions (ie., zero bracket amounts).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for cost-of-living adjustments in the amount of the personal exemptions and in the zero bracket amount which is the equivalent of the standard deduction of prior law.
